00040 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00041 BdkPdfCBArgus::BdkPdfCBArgus() : _fracCBShape(0) {
00042   // Default Constructor:
00043   addComponents();
00044 }
00045 
00046 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00047 BdkPdfCBArgus::BdkPdfCBArgus(const char * theName,
00048                                    const char * theDesc,
00049                                    RooRealVar & dependent)  : _fracCBShape(0) {
00050   // Initializing Constructor:
00051   addComponents();
00052   init(theName, theDesc, dependent);
00053 }
00054 
00055 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00056 BdkPdfCBArgus::~BdkPdfCBArgus() {
00057   // Destructor:
00058   deleteFrac();
00059 }

00063 // Dummy copy constructor:
00064     cout << "BdkPdfCBArgus::BdkPdfCBArgus -- dummy copy constructor"

00069 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00070 void BdkPdfCBArgus::init(const char * theName,
00071                             const char * theDesc,
00072                             RooRealVar & dependent) {
00073   // Initializer:
00074   _fracCBShape = 0;
00075 
00076   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00077   setDependent(dependent);
00078   initParameters();
00079 }
00080 
00081 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00082 void BdkPdfCBArgus::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00083   // Sets the dependent variable:
00084   _dependent = &dependent;
00085   _cbShape.setDependent(dependent);
00086   _argus.setDependent(dependent);
00087 
00088   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00089 }
00090 
00091 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00092 void BdkPdfCBArgus::initParameters() {
00093   // Initializes the contained RRV's and PDF wrappers:
00094   _fracCBShape = new RooRealVar(GetName() + TString(".fracCBShape"),
00095                               GetTitle () + TString(" fracCBShape"),
00096                               0.1, 0, 1);
00097 
00098   ((RooRealVar*)_fracCBShape)->setError(0.01);
00099 
00100   _cbShape.init(GetName() + TString(".cbShape"), 
00101               GetTitle() + TString(" Crystall Ball"), 
00102               *_dependent);
00103 
00104   _argus.init(GetName() + TString(".argus"), 
00105               GetTitle() + TString(" Argus"), 
00106               *_dependent);
00107 }
00108 
00109 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00110 void BdkPdfCBArgus::createPdf() {
00111   // Builds the PDF. The PDFs of the contained wrappers are automatically built
00112   _thePdf = new RooAddPdf(GetName() + TString(".thePdf"), 
00113                           GetTitle() + TString(" thePdf"), 
00114                           *_cbShape.getPdf(), 
00115                           *_argus.getPdf(),
00116                           *_fracCBShape);
00117 
00118   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00119 }
00120 
00121 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00122 void BdkPdfCBArgus::deleteFrac() {
00123   // Deletes pointers:
00124   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00125   if ( _fracCBShape != 0 )   delete _fracCBShape;
00126 }
00127 
00128 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00129 void BdkPdfCBArgus::addComponents() {
00130   // Adds the wrappers to the composite's list:
00131   addComponent(_cbShape);
00132   addComponent(_argus);
00133 }
00134 
00135 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00136 void BdkPdfCBArgus::linkParameters( BdkPdfCBArgus & pdf2)
00137 {
00138   // Copies RRV pointers:
00139   _cbShape.linkParameters(pdf2.cbShape());
00140   _argus.linkParameters(pdf2.argus());
00141   _fracCBShape = pdf2.fracCBShape();
00142 }
00143 
00144 void BdkPdfCBArgus::linkParameters(RooAbsReal * m0,
00145                                    RooAbsReal * sigma,
00146                                    RooAbsReal * alpha,
00147                                    RooAbsReal * enne,
00148                                    RooAbsReal * endPoint,
00149                                    RooAbsReal * exp,
00150                                    RooAbsReal * fracB)
00151 {
00152   // Copies RRV pointers:
00153   _cbShape.linkParameters(m0, sigma, alpha, enne);
00154   _argus.linkParameters(endPoint, exp);
00155                                                                                                                                           
00156   if (0 != fracB) {
00157     _fracCBShape = fracB;
00158     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00159   }
00160 }
